caption.p: Representative microphotographs of eosin-hematoxylin stained histology preparations of different thyroid tumor types. A – papillary thyroid cancer (TC), magnification X200, sample ID: TC_65; B - Follicular thyroid cancer (FC), magnification X50, sample ID: TC_119; C – Follicular adenoma (FA), magnification X100, sample ID: TC_22; D – medullary thyroid cancer (MC), magnification X50, sample ID: TC_17.
